word: G4963 - συστροφή - systrophḗ - soos-trof-ay' - + band together

sections.paragraph: 1. a twisting up together, a binding together
2. a secret combination, a coalition, conspiracy
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4962; a twisting together, that is, (figuratively) a secret coalition, riotous crowd: - + band together, concourse.
